meanings.definition: Beneath the surface of the earth
meanings.sent1: The ants built their nest subterraneously under the tree roots.
meanings.sent2: The treasure was hidden subterraneously in a secret cave.
meanings.sent3: The gnomes held a subterraneously extravagant party in their underground home.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the ancient tree spread subterraneously, connecting with other plants.
meanings.sent5: The miners dug subterraneously, searching for precious gems.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is underground or beneath the surface
meanings.sent1: The rabbit burrowed subterraneously to escape the predator.
meanings.sent2: The subway train travels subterraneously through tunnels beneath the city.
meanings.sent3: The mole sang subterraneously to entertain the other animals in the burrow.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the past lie subterraneously, waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The roots of the plants intertwined subterraneously in the dark soil.
